UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Peptides Derived from Fusion Peptides of Influenza A Viruses, a Promising Approach to Designing Potent Antimicrobial Agents.
Literature.Author: Wang J, Zhong W, Lin D, Xia F, Wu W, Zhang H, Lv L, Liu S, He J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 12600(MIC=>60.9µM),Streptococcus mutans ATCC 25175(MIC=>60.9µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>60.9µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>60.9µM)
